name: sRPG: A role-playing game for children
name_original: sRPG: A role-playing game for children
description:
sRPG was developed originally on post-it notes for my then-6-year-old neighbor-kid.   She felt a little left out when the adults were playing D&D, so we came up with this very rules-light game.  Our game didn't included hit points, but the revised version here incorporates hit points, leveling, and other featured in the "advanced" game.

sRPG will help children learn the basics of role-playing when Facilitated by an adult, and set them up for a lifetime of amazing adventures!

I was amazed to see my neighbor-kid break out the character sheets (still on post-its) and teach two of her friends to play.  It was one of the coolest role-playing moments I've ever had, and that just as an observer!
